title: Reflective Dialogue Learning Design for Multicultural Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of multicultural education fundamentals and foundational awareness of social equity issues
context.additional_context: Learners operate in a smartphone-based restricted technology environment and undergo comprehensive multicultural education competency assessments through project-based evaluations.

learning_goals: Learners can recognize their cultural biases in multicultural educational contexts and reflect through reflective journaling
Learners demonstrate discussion skills to analyze diverse cultural perspectives through dialogue-based collaboration with peer teachers
Learners design practical instructional strategies applicable to multicultural educational settings through project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
